# Site Information
Site: https://sharda-university-fee-calculator.vercel.app/
Name: Sharda University Fee Calculator
Description: A free online tool to calculate Sharda University fees for Bangladeshi students. Get detailed fee breakdowns for B.Tech CSE, MBBS, B.Sc Nursing, BBA, MBA and other courses with scholarship calculator.
Author: MD MILLAT HOSEN (@codermillat)
GitHub: https://github.com/codermillat

# Purpose
This website helps prospective students from Bangladesh calculate tuition fees, admission fees, and total costs for various courses at Sharda University, Greater Noida, India. It includes scholarship calculations based on GPA and provides year-wise fee breakdowns.

# Main Features
- Fee calculator for multiple courses (B.Tech CSE, MBBS, B.Sc Nursing, BBA, MBA, etc.)
- Scholarship calculator based on GPA (50% for GPA 3.5-5.0, 20% for GPA 3.0-3.4)
- Year-wise fee breakdown
- Grand total calculation
- Copy to clipboard functionality
- Mobile-friendly interface

# Target Audience
Prospective students from Bangladesh who want to study at Sharda University in India.
